|cpu1chip1 = Fullhan;FH8856V100; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Fullhan;FH8856V100;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This camera is based on a [[Vatilon]] PB1 module. It appears that Asecam is merely a white-label brand, and did not make any modifications to the Vatilon hardware or software.
===Specifications=== * IP Camera :Processor: [[Fullhan]] FH8856V100 :Image sensor: [[GalaxyCore]] GC4653 4MP 1/3" (Vatilon says it's a GC8053, but both OpenIPC's {{code | ipctool }} and examination of the stock firmware indicate that it's a GC4653.) :Memory: 128MB embedded RAM; 8MB SPI NOR flash (BoyaMicro BY25Q64ES) :Video: 8MP H.265 (HEVC) or H.264 (Despite the apparent 4MP sensor, the encoder does produce a 3840x2160 video stream.) :LAN: [[JLSemi]] JL1101 FE (10/100) :Ports: 1x FE (RJ45) PoE
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.aliexpress.com/item/3256802624432191.html Asecam product listing] *[https://www.vatilon.com/productinfo/1634907.html Vatilon PB1 module product page] *[https://www.vatilon.com/ipcrjxz Vatilon software downloads] *[https://www.mediafire.com/folder/s0c52sgrda5i1/ Asecam software downloads] *[https://pdf4pro.com/view/1-3-4mega-cmos-image-sensor-datasheet-7a89fa.html GalaxyCore GC4653 datasheet] *[http://www.main-soul.com/catalog/IC/Ethernet_IC/JLSEMI_JL11x1-v1.11.pdf JLSemi JL11x1 datasheet]
